title: Prohibits the use of a mobile telephone while operating a bicycle; repealer
summary: Prohibits the use of a mobile telephone while operating a bicycle upon a public highway, bicycle lane or roadway; provides an exception for emergency calls and hands-free mobile telephones; further prohibits local governments from regulating the use of a mobile telephone by bicycle operators and provides for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting the use of a mobile telephone while operating a bicycle and to prohibit local governments from regulating the use of mobile telephones by bicycle operators and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
